title: About
text:
Hello, my name is Philippe Sloksnath. I am a Research and Teaching Assistant at the Department of Communication and Media Research at University of Zurich. My research is situated in Communication Science and Human-Computer Interaction, with a particular focus AI-based persuasion, misinformation, and media effects. I care about statistical inference, and transparent and reproducible research practices.

Email: philippe.sloksnath@uzh.ch
GitHub: https://github.com/sloegge
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/philippe-sloksnath
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/philippesloksnath.bsky.social
Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=de&user=80htikoAAAAJ

title: Philippe Sloksnath
text: Hello, my name is Philippe Sloksnath. I am a Research and Teaching Assistant at the Department of Communication and Media Research at University of Zurich. This is my personal website, where I share my work, research, and projects.
